fields.body: I ordered on a friday, and had it delivered on wednesday, impressive work. The dress is fancy and looks great
Its a nice bag except I don't like the flimsy buttons. However the straps and trims shows great material work and I like it.
The shoes are amazing, everybody is asking me where did I get it from, and I am truly pleased.
I ordered these hoping to fit my feet, and it's a real tight fit I don't think it's correctly manufactured
